live_updates: Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve. A further update will be provided at 16:56 PT. Thank you for your patience.

Technicians continue to work to restore service as quickly possible. However, due to the nature of the repairs involved, we expect that this will take a few hours. We will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.
Technicians are on site working to restore service as quickly as possible. No ETA at this time but we will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.
Technicians are still on site working to resolve this as soon as possible.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
59878.summary: Some customers in the South Surrey area of Surrey are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
59878.title: Apr 8 - White Rock & Surrey (South Surrey) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: The issues have been resolved and all services should be up and running. Thank you for your patience.

Teams have confirmed a power outage is present in the area affecting our equipment. Please refer to your local power company for any updates. Once power is restored, services in the area should begin working. Our next update will be after the power is restored.
